definitions.definition: Any of various aromatic resins exuded from certain plants, especially trees of the genus Commiphora of Africa, Arabia and India and Myroxylon of South America.
A plant or tree yielding such substance.
Any soothing oil or lotion, especially an aromatic one.
definitions.example: There is a balm in Gilead... (Spiritual)
Classical music is a sweet balm for our sorrows.

definitions.definition: Any of a number of other aromatic herbs with a similar citrus-like scent, such as bee balm and horse balm.
To anoint with balm, or with anything medicinal.
